name: Valuation.extendToLocalization_apply_map_apply
initialProofState:
A : Type u_1
inst✝⁴ : CommRing A
Γ : Type u_2
inst✝³ : LinearOrderedCommGroupWithZero Γ
v : Valuation A Γ
S : Submonoid A
hS : LE.le S v.supp.primeCompl
B : Type u_3
inst✝² : CommRing B
inst✝¹ : Algebra A B
inst✝ : IsLocalization S B
a : A
⊢ Eq ((v.extendToLocalization hS B) ((algebraMap A B) a)) (v a)
decl:
@[simp]
theorem Valuation.extendToLocalization_apply_map_apply (a : A) :
    v.extendToLocalization hS B (algebraMap A B a) = v a :=
  Submonoid.LocalizationMap.lift_eq _ _ a
